enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: José Romero (Switzerland) reported on informal consultations.
SBI agreed to forward draft decisions to the COP (FCCC/SBI/2003/L.29/Add.1-2).

Regarding draft conclusions on assessing the status of implementation of Article 4.9 (LDCs), TANZANIA, for the LDCs, objected to reference that the SBI expressed satisfaction at the progress achieved so far in implementing the LDC work programme.

Following deliberations in Plenary, SBI agreed to forward draft conclusions to the COP (FCCC/SBI/2003/L.29/Add.3), amending them to note that progress on the implementation of Article 4.9 will be assessed at COP-10.
Regarding the provision of further guidance for the operation of the LDC Fund, TANZANIA, for the LDCs, stressed the need to reach agreement at COP-9 on this issue.
SBI agreed to forward the draft conclusions to the COP President for consultation (FCCC/SBI/2003/L.29).
